description:
Vodafone Greece will present the Digital Experience Layer, connecting our various digital channels with customer relationship management (CRM) systems. Established on 2017, it currently consists of 170+ microservices. 

A bottom-up discussion on Greek market with emphasis on the technology stack and the developer community - with reference to milestones and achievements, as well as a top-down approach about Vodafone global synergies and API reusability.
title: A DXL Journey by Vodafone Greece
